subject: Re: Usenet messages are appearing on beginners@perl.org
body:
On Jun 5, 7:03 pm, mumia.w.18.spam+nos...@earthlink.net (Mumia W.)
wrote:

> People who want usenet should subscribe to usenet newsgroups. I
> shouldn't have to see usenet happen on a mailing list I like. Whoever is
> in charge, I implore you to change the configuration of the maillist so
> that these usenet message don't come here any more.

With all due respect, feel free to set up a mail filter to block mine
or anyone else's email address.

Paul Lalli


-- 
To unsubscribe, e-mail: beginners-unsubscribe@perl.org
For additional commands, e-mail: beginners-help@perl.org
http://learn.perl.org/
